inputs.name: data
inputs.purpose: Angular data in degrees

inputs.name: edges
inputs.purpose: Histogram edges or number of bins

inputs.name: dataType
inputs.purpose: Input-data are distributions of angles or already-binned histogram-values

inputs.name: areAxialData
inputs.purpose: Specify whether input-data are axial or circular

inputs.name: scaleBarSide
inputs.purpose: Specify side of rho-axis scale bar

inputs.name: drawAvgAng
inputs.purpose: Specify whether average-angle should be graphically included

inputs.name: avgAng
inputs.purpose: Numeric value (degree) of average angle

inputs.name: drawAvgAngCi
inputs.purpose: Specify whether 95 % confidence interval of average-angle should be graphically included

inputs.name: avgAngCi
inputs.purpose: Numeric value (degree) of 95 % confidence interval (AVGANG +/- AVGANGCI)

inputs.name: drawR
inputs.purpose: Specify whether resultant vector length should be graphically included

inputs.name: r
inputs.purpose: Numeric value of resultant vector length (between 0 and 1)

inputs.name: baseLineOffset
inputs.purpose: Offset size (distance between plot center and histogram baseline) in percent of the rho-axis range

inputs.name: barWidth
inputs.purpose: Width of histogram bars in points

inputs.name: parent
inputs.purpose: Axes handle to plot diagram into

inputs.name: ax
inputs.purpose: Axes handle to plot diagram into

inputs.name: colorBar
inputs.purpose: Color of bars

inputs.name: colorStd
inputs.purpose: Color of standard-deviation lines

inputs.name: colorAvgAng
inputs.purpose: Color of average-angle lines

inputs.name: colorR
inputs.purpose: Color of resultant-vector-length lines

inputs.name: fontSize
inputs.purpose: Font size of axis labels
